panels.description: Number of queries with a given query type
panels.title: Queries by type

panels.description: Number of answers to queries, from cache or from recursion, by response code

panels.description:
Number of queries that were successfully answered using a cache lookup.

Number of cache queries that needed recursive processing.

panels.description: Number of queries handled by each worker thread
panels.title: Total queries by thread - stacked

panels.description: Query response time in seconds
panels.title: Response time

panels.title: Memory used by caches

panels.description: Number of queries that had a given flag set in the header
panels.title: Queries by flag

panels.description:
Number of queries that the Unbound server made using TCP outgoing towards other servers.

Number of queries that the Unbound server made using UDP outgoing towards other servers.

Number of queries that were made using TCP towards the Unbound server, including DoT and DoH queries.
panels.title: Queries by protocol in / out

panels.description:
Number of queries with a given query class.

Number of queries with a given query opcode.
panels.title: Queries by class

panels.description: Number of queries with a given query opcode.
panels.title: Queries by opcode

panels.description:
Number of DoH queries that were made towards the Unbound server.

Nmber of queries that were made using TCP TLS towards the Unbound server, including DoT and DoH queries.

Number of queries that were made using TCP TLS Resume towards the Unbound server.
panels.title: Queries by method

panels.description: Number of queries that were made using IPv6 towards the Unbound server.
panels.title: Queries by IPv6

panels.description:
Number of rrsets marked bogus by the validator.

Number of answers that were bogus.

panels.title: Answers secure

panels.description:
Number of Messages cached.

Number of rrset cached.

panels.description: Number of cache prefetches performed.
panels.title: Cache prefetches - stacked

panels.description: Current size of the request list

panels.title: Request list size

queries that were dropped because the request list was full

panels.title: Memory used by modules

panels.description: Number of expired entries served

panels.description: Number of replies sent to queries that needed recursive processing
panels.title: Replies sent to recursive queries - stacked

panels.description:
Number of queries that were refused or dropped because they failed the access control settings.

Number of replies that were unwanted or unsolicited.
panels.title: Queries / Replies refused by access control

panels.description:
Average time it took to answer queries that needed recursive processing (does not include in-cache requests).

The median of the time it took to answer queries that needed recursive processing.
panels.title: Recursive processing time

panels.description: Number of queries that the Unbound server generated response using Aggressive NSEC.
